This film tells the story of two men from different backgrounds who meet in Israel. One man is an American named Joe Spinell, while the other man is a German named Peter Boyle.
As the story unfolds, Joe and Peter become close friends and even begin to develop romantic feelings towards each other.
However, their relationship faces several challenges, including cultural differences, personal insecurities, and even some unforeseen plot twists.
Despite these challenges, Joe and Peter continue to work together and build a strong foundation of friendship and trust.
In the end, "The Good German" is a powerful and thought-provoking film that explores themes such as identity, culture, and relationships.

"The Warlords" follows a rookie cop's first day on duty in Los Angeles, California. He encounters a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.
